product_name: Mountain House Scrambled Eggs with Bacon - Single Serving
long_description: Freeze dried, scrambled-egg mix, flavored with real bacon. Stand-up pouch creates an easy way to cook and eat your meal; made from high-barrier foil, the pouch keeps your meal hot. Just add boiling water and enjoy an egg breakfast in only minutes. Contains MSG for flavor enhancement. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Freeze dried, scrambled-egg mix, flavored with real bacon.
